title: CBT Nuggets - CCNP Data Center DCUCI 642-999
description:
Cisco CCNP Data Center 642-999 DCUCI 5.0 by Anthony Sequeira <a href="
https://www.cbtnuggets.com/it-training-videos/course/cisco_642_999" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://www.cbtnuggets.com/it-training-videos/course/cisco_642_999</a>


In this incredibly in-depth course, CBT Nuggets trainer Anthony Sequeira guides students through the implementation of the Unified Computing System from Cisco, including C-series and B-series servers, the UCS chassis, Fabric Interconnects, and much more.


Recommended skills:
Knowledge contained in the two CCNA Data Center courses from CBT Nuggets: DCICN and DCICT

Recommended equipment:
The Cisco UCS Emulator Ã¢â‚¬â€œ latest version


Are you interested in learning the Cisco UCS system? This includes Cisco B-series blade servers, C-series rackmount servers, the UCS Chassis, and the Fabric Interconnects. This course details each element of these systems and teaches you how they integrate to form an amazingly robust and high performance data center system. From the smallest to the largest implementations, this course provides a key foundation in UCS expertise.


This course also provides guidance to pass the 642-999 DCUCI exam from Cisco Systems. Each Nugget ends with a practice question so you can confirm your knowledge, and get a sense for the actual Cisco exam. Do not miss your opportunity to expand your IT skills and learn this exciting Data Center system called the Unified Computing System (UCS).


Content:
01 - Course Introduction
02 - Installing the C-Series
03 - Installing the UCS Platform Emulator
04 - RBAC in the UCS
05 - Upgrading the B Series Firmware
06 - UCSM Backup and Restore
07 - Logging and Monitoring in UCS
08 - Fabric Interconnect Redundancy
09 - B-Series Physical Connectivity
10 - Installing B-Series Hardware
11 - B-Series LANs
12 - B-Series SANs
13 - Configuring the UCS Cluster
14 - Configuring the LAN
15 - Configuring the SAN
16 - Configuring Resource Pools
17 - Creating Service Profiles
18 - Service Profile Templates
19 - Integrating the C Series
20 - VM-FEX Universal Pass-Through
